channel.title: How i can change dummy/door and hay bales place
channel.description: yes how i can change objects place?

item.title: How i can change dummy/door and hay bales place
item.dc:creator: @Chunky_chaz Chunky chaz
item.description:
@Chunky_chaz wrote:

Find the ID’s for the hay bales, dummies and the doors on moparscape then search in client.java and find their cases and change the ID’s to the objectis you want.

Read full topic
item.source: How i can change dummy/door and hay bales place

item.title: How i can change dummy/door and hay bales place
item.dc:creator: @The_Mentor The Mentor
item.description:
@The_Mentor wrote:

Hmmh, this is a cool one.
Add this void with your other voids [code] public void thementor()
{
makeGlobalObject(3250,3430,2854,1,0,0);// reg wallz in ::train south
makeGlobalObject(3251,3430,2854,1,0,0);
makeGlobalObject(3252,3430,2854,1,0,0);
makeGlobalObject(3254,3430,2854,1,0,0);
makeGlobalObject(3255,3430,2854,1,0,0);
makeGlobalObject(3256,3430,2854,1,0,0);
makeGlobalObject(3259,3434,2854,1,0,0);
makeGlobalObject(3260,3434,2854,1,0,0);

	makeGlobalObject(3258,3432,2854,0,0,0);// reg wallz in ::train east
	makeGlobalObject(3258,3433,2854,0,0,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3261,3435,2854,0,0,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3261,3436,2854,0,0,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3261,3437,2854,0,0,0);

	makeGlobalObject(3260,3438,2854,3,0,0);//reg wallz in ::train north
	makeGlobalObject(3259,3438,2854,3,0,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3258,3438,2854,3,0,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3257,3438,2854,3,0,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3256,3438,2854,3,0,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3255,3438,2854,3,0,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3252,3440,2854,3,0,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3251,3440,2854,3,0,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3250,3440,2854,3,0,0);

	makeGlobalObject(3248,3438,2854,2,0,0);//reg wallz in ::train west
	makeGlobalObject(3248,3437,2854,2,0,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3248,3436,2854,2,0,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3248,3434,2854,2,0,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3248,3433,2854,2,0,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3248,3432,2854,2,0,0);

	makeGlobalObject(3249,3431,2854,1,9,0);//diag wallz in ::train
	makeGlobalObject(3249,3439,2854,2,9,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3253,3439,2854,3,9,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3254,3438,2854,3,9,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3258,3434,2854,4,9,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3257,3431,2854,4,9,0);

makeGlobalObject(3255, 3437, 6951, -1, 10);//dummys
makeGlobalObject(3257, 3437, 6951, -1, 10);
makeGlobalObject(3259, 3437, 6951, -1, 10);
//stools
makeGlobalObject(3257, 3433, 6951, -1, 10);
makeGlobalObject(3256, 3431, 6951, -1, 10);

makeGlobalObject(3255, 3432, 6951, -1, 10);//table1
makeGlobalObject(3255, 3434, 4463, 2, 10);//table2

	makeGlobalObject(3238,3434,7394,2,10); // rugs
	makeGlobalObject(3239,3435,668,2,10); // rugs

	makeGlobalObject(3260,3431,9299,3,0);// south farm walls
	makeGlobalObject(3259,3431,9299,3,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3258,3431,9299,3,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3257,3431,9299,3,0);

	makeGlobalObject(3261,3434,9299,0,0);// East farm walls
	makeGlobalObject(3261,3433,9299,0,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3261,3432,9299,0,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3261,3431,9299,0,0);

	makeGlobalObject(3258,3433,1528,0,0);//curtain

	makeGlobalObject(3252,3439,2513,2,10); //::train target

	makeGlobalObject(3255,3431,4462,2,10); //theif table at ::Train

	makeGlobalObject(3254,3431,5959,3,4); // lever at ::train

	makeGlobalObject(3250,3431,409,2,10);// Prayer Altar = EXP

	makeGlobalObject(3252,3434,2107,2,10);// Phat Rock = EXP

}[/code]
Find…

[code]public void objectClick(int objectID, int objectX, int objectY, int face, int face2, int GateID) {

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“thementor”))
println_debug(“atObject: “+objectX+”,”+objectY+" objectID: "+objectID);

switch(objectID) {[/code]
Under It Add…

[code]case 409: // pray alter, adding soon
if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {
if (actionTimer == 0) {
startAnimation(2927);
stillgfx(76, absY+1, absX);
stillgfx(76, absY, absX-1);
stillgfx(76, absY, absX+1);
sendMessage(“You Pray To The Gods…”);
sendMessage(“They Rape You in return… (+1k Pry Exp)”);
addSkillXP((1000playerLevel[5]), 5);
actionTimer = 14;
}
}
break;
case 2107:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
if(playerLevel[14] >= 120) {
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1275) {
sendMessage(“You Strike The Phat Rock With Great Force…”);
sendMessage("…And Recieve A Item!!!");
addSkillXP((2000playerLevel[14]), 1);
addItem(Item2.randomRuneRock(), 1);
actionTimer = 12;
startAnimation(625);
stillgfx(83, 3252, 3434);
txt4 = “WTF?! TENTICAL!”;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else {

	sendMessage("Either your Minning Blows or You Aint Equipping a Pick Noob..");

}
}
}
case 5959: // mage thing
if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 6)) {
if(actionTimer == 0)
{
sendMessage(“You pull the lever and…”);
sendMessage(“MERLIN WHACKS YOU!”);
addSkillXP((200*playerLevel[6]), 6);
actionTimer = 20;
stillgfx(245, absY, absX);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
break;
case 1529:
makeGlobalObject(3258,3433,1528,0,0);//curtainclosing
break;
case 1528:
makeGlobalObject(3258,3433,1529,0,0);//curtainopening
break;[/code]

Then find…

case 121:

Under It Add…

thementor();
